channel.title: Mystery box glitch

item.title: Mystery box glitch

@deathschaos9 wrote:

That if statement falls after a break or return, move it elsewhere.

item.title: Mystery box glitch

item.description:
@noobcoderh2o wrote:

Thankyou deathchaos for correcting his mistake. anyways got that done and another error. ugghghg -.–

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickItem.java:61: unreachable statement if (itemId == 6199) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Mystery box glitch
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Come on Thomas, don’t help him practice poor naming conventions, make the other l’s uppercase.

public static int randomLottery[] = {6585, 4151, 1067, 1115, 6737, 2653, 2655, 2670, 2671, 2673, 3480, 7158, 11700}; public static int randomLottery() { return randomLottery[(int) (Math.random() * randomLottery.length)]; }

Read full topic

item.title: Mystery box glitch
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Come on guys, pay attention to what you’re doing. You added the method randomlottery(), but you’re trying to call the method randomLottery(). Java is case sensitive

Read full topic

item.title: Mystery box glitch
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

noobcoderh2o:

if u give up on me can u itleast tell me were i added wrong. did i add the code to the wrong notepad? or is there a specific spot for the code to be at and if yes did i mess up both or what?

Your a fucking… no no no, I’m not getting another warning just because of this topic.

FIRST ADD THIS IN CLICK ITEM! DONT ADD THE RANDOMS!!!

if (itemId == 6199) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 50000000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(6199, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 50000000); c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().randomLottery(), 1); } else c.sendMessage("You need at least 50m."); }

THEN ONCE YOU ADDED IT, CLOSE CLICK ITEM, AND OPEN UP CLIENT.JAVA AND ADD:

public static int randomlottery[] = {6585, 4151, 1067, 1115, 6737, 2653, 2655, 2670, 2671, 2673, 3480, 7158, 11700}; public static int randomlottery() { return randomlottery[(int) (Math.random() * randomlottery.length)]; }

THEY DON’T GO IN THE SAME PLACE, LEARN TO READ PLEASE.

Read full topic

item.title: Mystery box glitch
item.dc:creator: @noobcoderh2o noobcoderh2o
item.description:
@noobcoderh2o wrote:

public static int randomlottery[] = {6585, 4151, 1067, 1115, 6737, 2653, 2655, 2670, 2671, 2673, 3480, 7158, 11700};public static int randomlottery() {    return randomlottery[(int) (Math.random() * randomlottery.length)];}

Added that in playerassist. like u said… then as u said if u use added it in playerassis add this code to clickitem

public static int randomlottery[] = {6585, 4151, 1067, 1115, 6737, 2653, 2655, 2670, 2671, 2673, 3480, 7158, 11700}; public static int randomlottery() { return randomlottery[(int) (Math.random() * randomlottery.length)]; } if (itemId == 6199) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 50000000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(6199, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 50000000); c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().randomLottery(), 1); } else c.sendMessage("You need at least 50m."); }

which i did and got those errors

Read full topic

item.title: Mystery box glitch
item.dc:creator: @noobcoderh2o noobcoderh2o
item.description:
@noobcoderh2o wrote:

Pi
source

Ok so i added mystery box. and i want it to take 50m when u open it. which it does if u have the money in ur inventory but if u dont have no 50m in ur inventory u can still open it. how do i make it say ( you cant open without 50m ) when u dont have the money. heres the code i put in client. if u need other codes dont be afraid to ask.

public void givereward() { if (getItems().playerHasItem(6199)) { getItems().deleteItem(995, 50000000); getItems().deleteItem(6199, 1); getItems().addItem(randomlottery(), 1); } else sendMessage("You need 50m to open this."); } public static int randomlottery[] = {6585, 4151, 1067, 1115, 6737, 2653, 2655, 2670, 2671, 2673, 3480, 7158, 11700}; public static int randomlottery() { return randomlottery[(int) (Math.random() * randomlottery.length)]; }

Read full topic
